response: Shimla-Manali and nearby areas is a great idea if you want to have a lazy vacation in the scenic Himalayas. You will have a wonderful experience there and there are lots of good hotels out there. You can go for cherry picking, nature walks, wildlife photography, long drives across valleys, go shopping in mall streets and much more. Also this trip can also become an adventurous one if you plan for paragliding or a road trip to Spiti. Do you want to explore more?
